name: Air Hockey 2P
description:
This game is a 2-player air hockey game.

Player 1 (right side) controls the red striker with the arrow keys.

Player 2 (left side) controls the green striker with the WASD keys.

First one to score 3 goals wins!

Link to scripts: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1Kes_jbQxmc5cJu1DW2c-JFO3tQ_kBbpz
